course_description: Study of the rules (primarily the ABA's Model Rules of Professional Conduct) and deeper principles that govern the legal profession, including the nature and content of the attorney-client relationship, conflicts of interest, appropriate advocacy, client identity in business contexts, ethics in negotiation, and issues of professionalism.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1069, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 9-10:30a, Instructor: P. Koster, Status: Closed
